review: Simple and easy to install and use.  Much faster than the Blu-ray player I was using for streaming video.  Some have complained about browsing for TV shows/ movies with the Fire stick - I simply do my browsing on my Kindle.Excellent product/value for the price.

review: Easy to use and incredibly user friendly

review: So easy to set up. Open the box, plug into the HDMI input, and it automatically finds the wi-fi connection. Now you are off to the races!
author: Adam Lewis
